description:
![Screenshot of NETGEAR ReadySHARE Vault](http://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/answer_media/images/Vault/img3.png)
	
Provides free, automatic continuous/scheduled backup for your Windows PCs on your home network.

[Supported Routers](http://kb.netgear.com/29848/Router-Apps)
summary: ReadyCLOUD gives you remote access over the Internet to a USB storage device that is connected to your router's USB port.
author: NETGEAR,  Inc.
